page.title: 18Local village events
page.content: The{Lastingham & Spaunton sports day is a yearly event at which all our children plus a few visitors are able to show off their track abilities. Starting with the fancy dress parade the youngsters get 50pence for entering & the winner receives Â£1.50 Â£1 for second & 50pence for third. Then there are flat races,three legged egg & spoon,sack & potato races. After all the events have been held & the prizes given,teams from the villages then pull against each other in a tug of war. The winning team keep the John Cooper cup for a year. Tea is then provided by the village ladies & the days events close with a cricket match In the evening,the tug-o-war is celebrated by having the cup filled with beer in the local pub. Other events include a flower & produce show & the vicarage garden fete.
